com.jscape.inet.ftp
Class Fxp

java.lang.Object
  com.jscape.inet.ftp.Fxp
public class Fxp
extends java.lang.Object

Implements the functionality of a basic FXP (FTP server to FTP server transfer)

mtransfer

public void mtransfer(Ftp source,
                      Ftp destination,
                      java.lang.String filter)
               throws FtpException
Transfer files matching regular expression from source FTP server to destination FTP server. For example, to transfer files ending with extension .txt use the regular expression ".\*\.txt".

Parameters:
source - the source FTP server
destination - the destination FTP server
filter - the file filter
Throws:
FtpException - if an I/O or FTP related error occurs
